936670.name: The Culling - Original Gangster Founder's Pack
936670.description:
Are you an OG supporter of The Culling? Want to join the OG club? Then step up and rock this old school flair. Plus it's a bargain method of getting a heap of Tokens and Cull Crates.

All users who purchased The Culling prior to its free-to-play transition are entitled to the Original Gangster Founder's Pack.

The pack contains the following (all cosmetics are exclusive to this pack):
  • 1000 Premium Tokens
  • 10 Cull Crates (each awards 4 standard cosmetic items)
  • Men's O.G. Outfit
  • Women's O.G. Outfit
  • Ray of Sunshine Victory Celebration
  • Check My Moves Taunt
  • Gangster Love Culling Card
  • GRL PWR Culling Card
  • Primo Cullinlg Card
  • O.G. Republic Culling Card
  • Original Gangster SMG Skin
  • Piggy Mantracker Skin

About The Culling
In a remote island paradise, 16 contestants have 25 minutes to explore, scavenge items, craft weapons, build traps, hunt and kill each other. There has never been a battle royale game this focused, brutal, and adrenaline-filled! Only one will be crowned the winner, do you have the guts to survive?
936670.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
